step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position. Keep your hands on your abdomen as instructed for the next step.
Well done placing your hands on your abdomen. Remember to inhale slowly through your nose while tightening your whole body muscles.
Excellent inhale with muscle tightening! Visualize the fluid moving to your chest as you breathe in.
Great exhale and muscle relaxation. Keep visualizing pushing fluid out as you complete your repetitions.
Good start for your second repetition. Remember to keep your hands on your abdomen for the next step.
Nicely done placing your hands. Continue to inhale slowly through your nose while tightening your whole body muscles.
Excellent inhale and muscle tightening! Keep visualizing the fluid moving towards your chest.
Great exhale and relaxation. You're doing a good job with this exercise.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the deep breathing exercise! Remember to inhale through your nose while tightening your muscles, and exhale through your mouth while relaxing. Keep up the good work with your lymphatic exercises.
